briefdescription.para: Texture doesn't resizes and fills all widget space.
Texture resizes and fills all widget space.

detaileddescription.para:
Available resize and view modes of texture
PT - Power of Two (size)

briefdescription.para: Call user delegate update and removes old texture if it isn't original.
Returns needed width while creating texture.
Returns needed height while creating texture.
Returns needed sizes while creating texture.
Returns needed sizes while creating texture.
Returns name of the current texture.
Checks if the texture has the source (required by user) size, otherwise real texture size are bigger.
Returns true if the texture was created (and exists), otherwise false.
Returns true if we own the texture, otherwise false.

simplesect.para: Be careful with assigning managed status to texture, which wasn't created in Canvas!

detaileddescription.para:
Event : Notify user texture instance will be changed
requestUpdateCanvas. signature : void method(MyGUI::Canvas* _canvas)
_canvas which
will be updated

Event : Texture instance was changed (May be caused by resizing texture or lossing device). User have to update all references to new instance of texture. signature : void method(MyGUI::Canvas* _canvas, MyGUI::Canvas::Event _event)
_canvas which
needs to update
_event

briefdescription.para: Update entered parameters according to current texture resize mode(size) and restore (if can) parameters of usage and format from texture.
Checks if we need to create a texture with such sizes.
Saved pointer from last calling lock.
true if we own the texture (can delete it or replace by another instance), otherwise false
For updating once per frame. True state means updating before next frame starts.
{Canvas} Widget wrapper over Texture - shows the texture. Implemented: resizing of texture (see TextureResizeMode); recovery after loosing device;
